item.title: Stheno add a quote by Richard Adams
item.description: "But I have learned that with creatures one loves, suffering is not the only thing for which one may pity them. A rabbit who does not know when a gift has made him safe is poorer than a slug, even though he may think otherwise himself." -- Richard Adams

item.title: Stheno add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Stheno add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "When trouble arises and things look bad, there is always one individual who perceives a solution and is willing to take command. Very often, that individual is crazy. " -- Dave Barry

item.title: Stheno add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "As you get older; you've probably noticed that you tend to forget things. You'll be talking with somebody at a party, and you'll know that you know this person, but no matter how hard you try, you can't remember his or her name. This can be very embarassing, especially if he or she turns out to be your spouse." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Stheno add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "It's called civilization. Women invented it, and every time you men blow it all to bits, we just invent it again." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Stheno add a quote by Derek Landy
item.description:
"Are you going to shoot me?' Vengeous sneered. 'I wouldn't be surprised. What would a thing like you know about honor? Only a heathen would bring a gun to a sword fight.'
And only a moron would bring a sword to a gunfight." -- Derek Landy
